```{r cars}
## Plotly to work on by Country
```{r}
merged_violence_df |>
  ggplot(aes(y = violence_rate, x = factor(year), group = country, 
             fill = violence_rate)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = country))


merged_violence_df |>
  ggplot(aes(y = homicide_rate, x = factor(year), group = country, 
             fill = homicide_rate)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = country))
```
